description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) serves as the primary transport regulatory body for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating within the Darbhanga administrative division. It is responsible for essential services including vehicle registration, issuance of permanent driving licenses, and enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act throughout its jurisdiction. The office plays a critical role in collecting road taxes and ensuring compliance with road safety standards across sub-regions like Rosera and Dalsinghsarai.
address: District Transport Office, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
